mapper.insert: insert into tbl_project (prj_no, prj_title, start_d8, end_d8, prj_writer, prj_mod_writer, prj_write_d8, prj_mod_d8, prj_content, prj_remark, cond, rmv_yn) values ( tbl_project_seq.nextval, #{prj_title}, #{start_d8}, #{end_d8}, 'test', 'test', sysdate, sysdate, #{prj_content}, #{prj_remark}, #{cond}, 'N')
